member.name: M:Chess.LegalMoveSet.isCheck(Chess.ChessBoard,Chess.Player)
member.summary: Checks to see if the king for a player is in check. This function works by pretending the king is each of the different board pieces and seeing if it can attack any of the same type of price from its current position.
